review_body: This app was working fine for me for a while but it's gotten so buggy recently! I had to recreate several social posts because the app either crashed or reformatted the text when it saved in the library. For one of my blog posts there's an image I can't locate in the editor but shows up in the URL l...Full ReviewThis app was working fine for me for a while but it's gotten so buggy recently! I had to recreate several social posts because the app either crashed or reformatted the text when it saved in the library. For one of my blog posts there's an image I can't locate in the editor but shows up in the URL link to view the post. What's going on :( ?? So many great features and ideas but it's just not working well!

Sadly. Tried to use the app just to edit the spacing on the title of one of my blogs. Now I just have to take down post completely so I c...Full ReviewSadly. Tried to use the app just to edit the spacing on the title of one of my blogs. When I hit save and publish and look at it on browser, entire text/image of the post was deleted/gone (except for one sentence) and now there's no way to restore. Now I just have to take down post completely so I can think hard and write exactly the same words again. Nice work.üëç

If you're going to be using this app to write blogs on the go, don't!!! The amount of work I've lost because it hasn't saved or you get a message popping up on the screen, saying 'something has gone wrong, we're working on it's, is soul destroying. I've been into this morning to look at a blog in my...Full ReviewIf you're going to be using this app to write blogs on the go, don't!!! The amount of work I've lost because it hasn't saved or you get a message popping up on the screen, saying 'something has gone wrong, we're working on it's, is soul destroying. I've been into this morning to look at a blog in my draft folder, that I started 4 weeks as part of a product review, 3/4 of it is missing. Also if you're working from the desktop version, it hasn't been converting over updates to the app.

Extraordinary! I have a blog on here and it is the best platform I have used. The app is very user friendly for the manager. Editiing everything is so easy to do with great options and they allow so much room for creativity. I love this app and I look forward to growing my fanbase on it.

The app is having glitches.. So when things like this happens we have a safety net

First, i can't upload a photo directly while i'm editing one of my blogs, i have to go to media manager, upload it there, and choose it inside the blog editor. 2nd, i can't see the photo that i uploaded. Fix your app. I can only edit texts.

The app just won't show details for any selection, like when you click on the order, it's simply a plain screen with nothing on it. This is a critical compinent for me to ensure orders are marked confirmed and fulfilled in time. App seems to be structured well and that's the only good part.

Plus editing blog posts is still a nightmare since a decade. Cursor randomly jumps all over your text if you're not super careful!

Not to pile on like the other reviews, but this update has definitely been a step backwards. I wasn't initally impressed, but decided to give it some time. Yes, the functionality is still there, but it's buried in non-intuitive places. You can easily tell the new version was pushed by people that do...Full ReviewNot to pile on like the other reviews, but this update has definitely been a step backwards. I wasn't initally impressed, but decided to give it some time. Yes, the functionality is still there, but it's buried in non-intuitive places. You can easily tell the new version was pushed by people that don't actually use the product. Let's start by considering how and why people use the app. First, I like to be able to respond in real time to messages, and it's nice to see visitor and sales activity at a glance. Second, I use the app at shows to make sales onsite. Everything else the app can do is extra. Good to have, but not priority. Given this, why have you buried the PoS screen? It used to be right on the homescreen, now it is under the very non-intuitive "Manage" button. It took me almost 5 minutes of hunting around the first time to find it. Also, Chat is a non-intuitive place to view store orders. I'm sure there's another screen for it, but I haven't found it yet. Please, return these buttons to the homescreen, and allow me to default to my website without additional taps. Most people probably aren't managing multiple stores, and those that are can be reasonably expected to toggle between them as needed. If nothing else, for the love of all that is good and holy, please let me change away from that hot pink background and headers! It is truly awful.

For people having different websites to manage, there's too many clicks to go where we need...Full ReviewSorry I had to lower my rating, guys your definitely good with the encoding. But the UI and the feeling, needs to be more coherent. What is the advantage to create a profile? It is not slick, smooth or smart. For people having different websites to manage, there's too many clicks to go where we need to be. Look at where everyone is going the most and make them really accessible quicker. I always stay with you because you have a great customer service and you have so much more potential. Thanks.

Latest update completely changed the function of the app! I have mixed feelings about this update and here's why: When I first downloaded the app I was expecting it to be what it is now - a duplicate version of the management dashboard as on web- but I ended up utilizing the the social media posting...Full ReviewLatest update completely changed the function of the app! I have mixed feelings about this update and here's why: When I first downloaded the app I was expecting it to be what it is now - a duplicate version of the management dashboard as on web- but I ended up utilizing the the social media posting and chat function the most. These two features are no longer in the app - when I get a notification of visitor, I can no longer see them, where they are on the site or chat with them. Same for the option to create cross platform social media posts - they simply dissappered! So I'm not happy with that at all. That being said, the app now seems to be more like the web dashboard. Wix should definitely have notified existing users about the change, since it is very dramatic and changes the way we opperate. If the features from the version before the update could be included, it'll make the app super awesome!

I like the app. It's very useful! But there are small things that can be done to improve the experience. I tried to find a way to contact the support team directly but i could not find any way hence decided to write the review here.  The Forum (on the mobile app) randomly adds a line space if any te...Full ReviewI like the app. It's very useful! But there are small things that can be done to improve the experience. I tried to find a way to contact the support team directly but i could not find any way hence decided to write the review here.  The Forum (on the mobile app) randomly adds a line space if any text in the original forum is in bold, which does not look nice. This is not a problem in the blog (on the mobile app) so i'm guessing it should be an easy fix that you should look into.   Secondly, the notifications don't always work as expected. I.e suppose i get a notification that someone commented on my blog. Once i open the notification it doesn't take me to the specific comment on the blog post, instead it just opens the entire blog, after which i have to manually open the comments section of the relevant blog. I hope this is also fixed soon.  Thirdly, searching for members (to invite to a group in the mobile app) is quite slow. I hope this process is made smoother soon.  And lastly, whenever i invite someone to the mobile app (using invite via email option), the recipient never gets the email. Forcing me to use the website invite code to invite them to the application.

Everything that initially seemed easy revealed itself so complicated to implement, app just useless and not user friendly at all, rates for my property difficult to set up the way I wanted them to be..... and NO CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! Only FAQs with which I had to struggle to read and find my way through....   Luckily, HotelRunner (wix partner) had wonderful people to deal with and assisted as much as they could.. They couldn't sort out everything though and I really hope that before advertising all services Wix is, they should ensure they work properly first....   And a contact person should be available to assist and answer specific request.
